name: securitycentermanagement
ruby-cloud-description: Management API for Security Command Center, a built-in security and risk management solution for Google Cloud. Use this API to programmatically update the settings and configuration of Security Command Center. Note that google-cloud-security_center_management-v1 is a version-specific client library. For most uses, we recommend installing the main client library google-cloud-security_center_management instead. See the readme for more details.
